thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: LORE G

author: LORE G
title: LORE G
text: Awesome customer service and good price, great experience all around! I've never order contacts online before and I'm glad I went with opticontacts. I placed my order and I sent a picture of my prescription. In the morning after, I had an email from them letting me know that the numbers I placed didn't match the prescription. I didn't realize I put the wrong numbers and I'm impressed they caught it. The order arrived in less than a week with no mistakes. Awesome experience and I'm definitely getting my contacts from them from now on.
